param.CONTENT: <?xml version="1.0"?> <Root> <!-- Tags for version 2.6 --> <MakeDirFile>true</MakeDirFile> <!-- Tags common to versions 2.6 and 3 --> <!-- Host>192.168.3.96</Host --> <HTTPMode>http</HTTPMode> <Host></Host> <!-- IP or http://namespace.tenant.cluster.dns.suffix --> <BaseDir></BaseDir> <!-- Tags for version 3 --> <Port>443</Port> <UserName>superadmin</UserName> <Password>Hitachi2009</Password> <Encoding>UTF-8</Encoding> <NameSpaceName>name</NameSpaceName> <TenantName>demo</TenantName> <HCPName>vmhcp</HCPName> <DomainName>domain.local</DomainName> <AuthenticateServer>false</AuthenticateServer> <!-- Tags understood starting from driver for HCP v4 --> <Pools> <Defaults> <HTTPMode>https</HTTPMode> <Host></Host> <!-- IP or http://namespace.tenant.cluster.dns.suffix --> <BaseDir>TestsJMF</BaseDir> <Port></Port> <UserName>jmf1</UserName> <Password>jmf1</Password> <Encoding>UTF-8</Encoding> <NameSpaceName>name</NameSpaceName> <TenantName>test</TenantName> <HCPName>hcp1</HCPName> <DomainName>domain.com</DomainName> <AuthenticateServer>false</AuthenticateServer> <RetryMax>0</RetryMax> <RetryDelay>5000</RetryDelay> </Defaults> <!-- Test3> <HTTPMode>https</HTTPMode> <Host></Host> <BaseDir>TestsJMF</BaseDir> <Port></Port> <UserName>jmf1</UserName> <Password>jmf1</Password> <Encoding>UTF-8</Encoding> <NameSpaceName>name</NameSpaceName> <TenantName>demo</TenantName> <HCPName>hcpvm</HCPName> <DomainName>demo.fr</DomainName> <AuthenticateServer>false</AuthenticateServer> <RetryMax>0</RetryMax> <RetryDelay>5000</RetryDelay> </Test3 --> </Pools> </Root>

<?xml version="1.0"?> <Netapp> <Pools> <Pool1> <Host>NETAPP</Host> <!-- host or IP --> <Port></Port> <!-- NOT MANDATORY if default port 80 is used --> <UserName>root</UserName> <!-- NOT MANDATORY if no authentication is required --> <Password>r0otr0ot</Password> <!-- NOT MANDATORY if no authentication is required --> <HttpBaseDir>/vol/wormvol/</HttpBaseDir> <!-- must end with "/" --> <FileBaseDir>Z:/</FileBaseDir> <!-- must end with "/" --> </Pool1> <Pool2> <Host>NETAPP</Host> <!-- host or IP --> <Port></Port> <!-- NOT MANDATORY if default port 80 is used --> <UserName>root</UserName> <!-- NOT MANDATORY if no authentication is required --> <Password>r0otr0ot</Password> <!-- NOT MANDATORY if no authentication is required --> <HttpBaseDir>/vol/vol0/</HttpBaseDir> <!-- must end with "/" --> <FileBaseDir>Y:/</FileBaseDir> <!-- must end with "/" --> </Pool2> </Pools> </Netapp>

<?xml version="1.0"?> <param> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.archives.workFlow.scheduler.LookForExpiredTasks</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <periodicity>86400000</periodicity> <autostart>true</autostart> <args> <arg>dbname=dportal</arg> <arg>processingdelay=30</arg> <arg>taskname=A valider</arg> <arg>processname=eliminationProcess</arg> <arg>mailsubject=Tâche en retard</arg> <arg>mailbody=archive/mail/mailWkfReminder.htm</arg> </args> </task> --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.drm.SendModifRecords</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <periodicity>60000</periodicity> <autostart>true</autostart> <session> <usercode>admin</usercode> </session> </task> --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.core.schedule.testScheduler</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <periodicity>cron:3/30 40-45,50-55 * * * ?</periodicity> <autostart>true</autostart> <args> <arg>cron:3/30 40-45,50-55 * * * ?</arg> </args> </task> --> <!-- example : PurgeEventsOlderThan= "5000 events", "19 logs", "7 months", "2 years", "3 days", "where ..." --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.sae.log.LogBuilderSchedule</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <date> <time> <format>HOUR_OF_DAY</format> <value>23</value> </time> <time> <format>MINUTE</format> <value>00</value> </time> </date> <periodicity>3600000</periodicity> <autostart>true</autostart> <args> <arg>ONELOGBYDAY</arg> <arg>MaxEventsForOnePdf=5000</arg> <arg>StoreLogXml=attachment</arg> <arg>PurgeEventsOlderThan=10 logs</arg> </args> </task> --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.capture.JobScheduler</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <periodicity>60000</periodicity> <autostart>true</autostart> <args/> </task> --> <!-- params [0] : duration (second) : ignore jobs created under last N seconds" params [1] : boolean (true/false) : delete associated files" --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.dcs.schedule.ScheduledConversion</class> <entrypoint>CleanEndedAsyncJobs</entrypoint> <periodicity>1800000</periodicity> <autostart>true</autostart> <args> <arg>3600</arg> <arg>true</arg> </args> </task> --> <!-- params [0] : number of DCSJOB rows to be processed each time --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.dcs.schedule.ScheduledConversion</class> <entrypoint>StartAsyncJobs</entrypoint> <periodicity>1800000</periodicity> <autostart>true</autostart> <args> <arg>1800000</arg> </args> </task> --> <!-- params [0] : where clause for "select .. from PRET_ELEM where <where>" params [1] : usercode for mailAdmin example : "es-archives" params [2] : key of CSOMS_MAPPING used for PDF generation params [3] : template for user mail params [4] : template for admin mail params [5] : title for user mail params [6] : title for admin mail --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.archives.mail.ScheduledRelancesGen</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <date> <time> <format>HOUR_OF_DAY</format> <value>10</value> </time> <time> <format>MINUTE</format> <value>15</value> </time> </date> <periodicity>360000</periodicity> <autostart>true</autostart> <args> <arg></arg> <arg>es-archives</arg> <arg>6</arg> <arg>../apps/ARCHIVES/Templates/comm/relance/mailRelance.htm</arg> <arg>../apps/ARCHIVES/Templates/comm/relance/mailRelanceAdmin.htm</arg> <arg>Archives - Relance de pret</arg> <arg>Archives - Echec des relances de pret</arg> </args> </task> --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.portal.voffice.clsDiffList</class> <periodicity>300000</periodicity> <autostart>false</autostart> <args> <arg></arg> </args> </task> --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.oss.OSSCache</class> <entrypoint>purgeCaches</entrypoint> <periodicity>1800000</periodicity> <autostart>true</autostart> <args> <arg>1800000</arg> </args> </task> --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.ods.loader.SourceLoaderTask</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <periodicity>300000</periodicity> <autostart>false</autostart> <args> <arg>...loader name...</arg> </args> </task> --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.doc.transfer.DocTransferSchedule</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <periodicity>300000</periodicity> <autostart>true</autostart> <args> <arg>dPortal</arg> <arg>5000</arg> </args> </task> --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.capture.PurgeFinishedJobs</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <periodicity>1800000</periodicity> <autostart>true</autostart> <args> <arg>RunWebApp=this</arg> <arg>JobName=Excel%</arg> <arg>AfterDate=20120131</arg> <arg>BeforeDate=20120301</arg> <arg>BeforeDays=7</arg> </args> </task> --> <!-- Purge lock records from CSLOCKREC. Criterions may include '%' as wilcards. If an argument is empty, it is not inserted into the filter request.
KeepSeconds : Records will be deletes until their creation date is less than or equal to 'now' minus 'KeepSeconds' Criterion1 : Optional filter for column of same name Criterion2 : Optional filter for column of same name Criterion3 : Optional filter for column of same name --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.core.db.lockrec.PurgeCSLockRecScheduler</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <periodicity>1800000</periodicity> <autostart>false</autostart> <args> <arg>KeepSeconds=10000</arg> <arg>Criterion1=</arg> <arg>Criterion2=\dPortal\VERSEMENTS\%</arg> <arg>Criterion3=</arg> </args> </task> --> <!-- Purge lock records from CSLOCKMNG & CSLOCKTRANS, if not currently locked. If KeepSeconds is Empty its value is set to DB_MaxLockDuration. If Force is empty, it defaults to false. Other arguments may include '%' as wilcards. If an argument is empty, it is not inserted into the filter request.
KeepSeconds : Records will be deletes until their creation date is less than or equal to 'now' minus 'KeepSeconds' DBName : Optional DBname to identify the records to delete TableName : Optional Table name to identify the records to delete RecordKey : Optional Key to identify the records to delete Force : true allows to force delete records which have UNLOCKED=0 --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.core.db.lck.PurgeCSLockMngScheduler</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <periodicity>1800000</periodicity> <autostart>false</autostart> <args> <arg>KeepSeconds=600</arg> <arg>DBName=dPort%</arg> <arg>TableName=</arg> <arg>RecordKey=</arg> <arg>Force=true</arg> </args> </task> --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.core.provider.impl.asyncaction.AsyncActionScheduler</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <periodicity>60000</periodicity> <autostart>true</autostart> <args> <arg>AbbyyRS</arg> <arg>10</arg> </args> </task> --> <!-- param[0] Max folders to scan : leave it empty if you want to use default value param[1] Max time execution in ms : leave it empty if you want to use default value param[...] Directories to scan : one or more --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.docs.DeleteEmptyFoldersInstances</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <periodicity>86400000</periodicity> <autostart>false</autostart> <args> <arg>1000000</arg> <arg>600000</arg> <arg>D:\docs\dPortal\ESDMS_DEMO\000\000</arg> <arg>D:\docs\dPortal\ESDMS_DEMO\000\001</arg> </args> </task> --> <!-- param[0] : export path param[1] : leave it empty to export all spaces or assign space id param[2] : set it to true if you want to use timeStamp (default : false) --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.el.tools.ExportManager</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <periodicity>86400000</periodicity> <autostart>false</autostart> <args> <arg>export/cws/scheduledExport</arg> </args> <session> <usercode>admin</usercode> </session> </task> --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.img.rendering.tools.DocCache</class> <entrypoint>purgeCache</entrypoint> <periodicity>7200000</periodicity> <autostart>true</autostart> <args> </args> </task> --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.doc.ext.PDFProcessorScheduler</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <periodicity>10000</periodicity> <autostart>false</autostart> <session> <usercode>admin</usercode> </session> </task> --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.doc.ext.PDFExtractorScheduler</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <periodicity>10000</periodicity> <autostart>false</autostart> <session> <usercode>admin</usercode> </session> </task> --> <!-- Example : "5000" log or which date is less than "02/25/2015 02:08:06" --> <!-- <task> <class>es.cls.trans.PurgeDataScheduler</class> <entrypoint>callFromScheduler</entrypoint> <periodicity>86400000</periodicity> <autostart>true</autostart> <args> <arg>1000</arg> </args> </task> --> </param>

<?xml version="1.0"?> <LoginConfiguration>
<IdentityRouters> <!-- Definitions and parameters to detect identity route. The choice of application for authentication depends on the source where the user identity is found. -->
<!-- Two phases authentication -->
<IdentityRouter> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.IdentityRouterForm</ClassName> <TargetApplication>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_ParamGA1</TargetApplication> <LoginRequest>login?UserGA1=${user}&PasswordGA1=${password}&redirect=none</LoginRequest> <Params> <ParamUser>UserGA1</ParamUser> <ParamPassword>PasswordGA1</ParamPassword> <ParamSaveCookie>false</ParamSaveCookie> </Params> </IdentityRouter>
<IdentityRouter> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.IdentityRouterForm</ClassName> <TargetApplication>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_ParamGA2</TargetApplication> <LoginRequest>login?UserGA2=${user}&PasswordGA2=${password}&CodeGA2=${authcode}&redirect=none</LoginRequest> <Params> <ParamUser>UserGA2</ParamUser> <ParamPassword>IdGA1</ParamPassword> <ParamAuthCode>CodeGA2</ParamAuthCode> <ParamSaveCookie>false</ParamSaveCookie> </Params> </IdentityRouter>
<!-- Two phases authentication -->
<IdentityRouter> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.IdentityRouterForm</ClassName> <TargetApplication>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_ParamTOTP1</TargetApplication> <LoginRequest>login?UserTOTP1=${user}&PasswordTOTP1=${password}&redirect=none</LoginRequest> <Params> <ParamUser>UserTOTP1</ParamUser> <ParamPassword>PasswordTOTP1</ParamPassword> <ParamSaveCookie>true</ParamSaveCookie> </Params> </IdentityRouter>
<IdentityRouter> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.IdentityRouterForm</ClassName> <TargetApplication>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_ParamTOTP2</TargetApplication> <LoginRequest>login?UserTOTP2=${user}&PasswordTOTP2=${password}&CodeTOTP2=${authcode}&redirect=none</LoginRequest> <Params> <ParamUser>UserTOTP2</ParamUser> <ParamPassword>IdTOTP1</ParamPassword> <ParamAuthCode>CodeTOTP2</ParamAuthCode> <ParamSaveCookie>false</ParamSaveCookie> </Params> </IdentityRouter>
<!-- One phase authentication -->
<IdentityRouter> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.IdentityRouterForm</ClassName> <TargetApplication>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_Param</TargetApplication> <LoginRequest>login?user_name=${user}&password=${password}&redirect=none</LoginRequest> <Params> <ParamUser>user_name</ParamUser> <ParamPassword>password</ParamPassword> </Params> </IdentityRouter> <IdentityRouter> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.IdentityRouterToken</ClassName> <TargetApplication>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_Token</TargetApplication> <LoginRequest>login?user_token=${token}&redirect=none</LoginRequest> <Params> <ParamToken>user_token</ParamToken> </Params> </IdentityRouter> <IdentityRouter> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.IdentityRouterSSO</ClassName> <TargetApplication>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_SSO</TargetApplication> <LoginRequest>login?redirect=none</LoginRequest> <Params> </Params> </IdentityRouter> <IdentityRouter> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.IdentityRouterKrbTGT</ClassName> <TargetApplication>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_KrbTGT</TargetApplication> <LoginRequest>login?krb_tgt=${tgt}&redirect=none</LoginRequest> <Params> <ParamTGT>krb_tgt</ParamTGT> </Params> </IdentityRouter> <IdentityRouter> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.IdentityRouterCertificate</ClassName> <TargetApplication>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_Certificate</TargetApplication> <LoginRequest>login?redirect=none</LoginRequest> <Params> <AttrUser>UID</AttrUser> </Params> </IdentityRouter> <IdentityRouter> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.IdentityRouterHeaders</ClassName> <TargetApplication>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_Headers</TargetApplication> <LoginRequest>login?redirect=none</LoginRequest> <Params> <HeaderUser>X-Auth-User</HeaderUser> <HeaderPassword>X-Auth-Password</HeaderPassword> </Params> </IdentityRouter> <IdentityRouter> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.IdentityRouterCookies</ClassName> <TargetApplication>EverSuite_Servlet_Login</TargetApplication> <LoginRequest>login?user_name=guest&password=guest&redirect=none</LoginRequest> <Params> </Params> </IdentityRouter>
<!-- When no identity found, provide a "guest" connection --> <IdentityRouter> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.IdentityRouterGuest</ClassName> <TargetApplication>EverSuite_Servlet_Login</TargetApplication> <LoginRequest>login?user_name=guest&password=guest&redirect=none</LoginRequest> <Params> </Params> </IdentityRouter> </IdentityRouters>
<Applications> <!-- Definitions which use modular LoginModules like LoginModuleLDAP or LoginModuleCSUSER. --> <Application> <Name>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_ParamGA1</Name> <UserManagerHandler> <ClassName></ClassName> <Params/> </UserManagerHandler> <CallbackHandler> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.callback.CallbackHandlerImpl</ClassName> <Params> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> </Params> </CallbackHandler>
<LoginModules> <LoginModule> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.module.LoginModuleCSUSER</ClassName> <FlagName>Required</FlagName> <Params> <UserRolesProvider>es.cls.core.security.login.module.UserRolesProviderCSUSER</UserRolesProvider> <UpdateUserRoles>false</UpdateUserRoles> <MayDeleteRoles>false</MayDeleteRoles> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> </Params> </LoginModule> <LoginModule> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.module.LoginModuleGoogleAuth1</ClassName> <FlagName>Required</FlagName> <Params> <ValiditySeconds>30</ValiditySeconds> </Params> </LoginModule> </LoginModules> </Application>
<Application> <Name>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_ParamGA2</Name> <UserManagerHandler> <ClassName></ClassName> <Params/> </UserManagerHandler> <CallbackHandler> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.callback.CallbackHandlerImpl</ClassName> <Params> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> </Params> </CallbackHandler>
<LoginModules> <LoginModule> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.module.LoginModuleGoogleAuth2</ClassName> <FlagName>Required</FlagName> <Params> <UserRolesProvider>es.cls.core.security.login.module.UserRolesProviderCSUSER</UserRolesProvider> <UpdateUserRoles>false</UpdateUserRoles> <MayDeleteRoles>false</MayDeleteRoles> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> <CodeTryCOunt>3</CodeTryCOunt> </Params> </LoginModule> </LoginModules> </Application>
<Application> <Name>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_ParamTOTP1</Name> <UserManagerHandler> <ClassName></ClassName> <Params/> </UserManagerHandler> <CallbackHandler> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.callback.CallbackHandlerImpl</ClassName> <Params> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> </Params> </CallbackHandler>
<LoginModules> <LoginModule> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.module.LoginModuleCSUSER</ClassName> <FlagName>Required</FlagName> <Params> <UserRolesProvider>es.cls.core.security.login.module.UserRolesProviderCSUSER</UserRolesProvider> <UpdateUserRoles>false</UpdateUserRoles> <MayDeleteRoles>false</MayDeleteRoles> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> </Params> </LoginModule> <LoginModule> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.module.LoginModuleSMSOVH</ClassName> <FlagName>Required</FlagName> <Params> <UserRolesProvider>es.cls.core.security.login.module.UserRolesProviderCSUSER</UserRolesProvider> <UpdateUserRoles>false</UpdateUserRoles> <MayDeleteRoles>false</MayDeleteRoles> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> <SMSAccount>sms-mj437367-1</SMSAccount> <SMSLogin>alainrussier</SMSLogin> <SMSPassword>sd5fg5g7</SMSPassword> <SMSFrom>EVER TEAM</SMSFrom> <SMSURL>https://www.ovh.com/cgi-bin/sms/http2sms.cgi?</SMSURL> <SMSToNumberAttr>mobile</SMSToNumberAttr> <SMSMessage>SMSAuthCodeMessage</SMSMessage> <SMSValiditySeconds>300</SMSValiditySeconds> </Params> </LoginModule> </LoginModules> </Application>
<Application> <Name>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_ParamTOTP2</Name> <UserManagerHandler> <ClassName></ClassName> <Params/> </UserManagerHandler> <CallbackHandler> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.callback.CallbackHandlerImpl</ClassName> <Params> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> </Params> </CallbackHandler>
<LoginModules> <LoginModule> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.module.LoginModuleTOTP2</ClassName> <FlagName>Required</FlagName> <Params> <UserRolesProvider>es.cls.core.security.login.module.UserRolesProviderCSUSER</UserRolesProvider> <UpdateUserRoles>false</UpdateUserRoles> <MayDeleteRoles>false</MayDeleteRoles> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> <CodeTryCOunt>3</CodeTryCOunt> </Params> </LoginModule> </LoginModules> </Application>
<Application> <Name>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_Token</Name> <UserManagerHandler> <ClassName></ClassName> <Params/> </UserManagerHandler>
<CallbackHandler> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.callback.CallbackHandlerToken</ClassName> <Params> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> </Params> </CallbackHandler>
<LoginModules> <LoginModule> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.module.LoginModuleSSO</ClassName> <FlagName>Required</FlagName> <Params> <UserRolesProvider>es.cls.core.security.login.module.UserRolesProviderCSUSER</UserRolesProvider> <UpdateUserRoles>true</UpdateUserRoles> <MayDeleteRoles>false</MayDeleteRoles> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> </Params> </LoginModule> </LoginModules> </Application>
<Application> <Name>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_SSO</Name> <UserManagerHandler> <ClassName></ClassName> <Params/> </UserManagerHandler>
<CallbackHandler> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.callback.CallbackHandlerSSO</ClassName> <Params> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> </Params> </CallbackHandler>
<LoginModules> <LoginModule> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.module.LoginModuleSSO</ClassName> <FlagName>Required</FlagName> <Params> <UserRolesProvider>es.cls.core.security.login.module.UserRolesProviderLDAP</UserRolesProvider> <UpdateUserRoles>true</UpdateUserRoles> <MayDeleteRoles>false</MayDeleteRoles> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> <UserRoleMemberAttrName>memberOf</UserRoleMemberAttrName> <UserRoleRegExp>CN=(\w+)</UserRoleRegExp> <LDAPConfig> <url>ldap://.../</url> <baseDN>DC=...,DC=...</baseDN> <userLogToLDAP>true</userLogToLDAP> <defaultUser></defaultUser> <defaultRole></defaultRole> <usersRoot></usersRoot> <adminLDAPLogin>CN=...,OU=...,OU=...,DC=...,DC=...</adminLDAPLogin> <adminLDAPPassword>...</adminLDAPPassword> <loginAttrName>sAMAccountName</loginAttrName> <roleAttrName></roleAttrName> <mapField> <USERCODE>cn</USERCODE> <LASTNAME>sn</LASTNAME> <FIRSTNAME>givenName</FIRSTNAME> <EMAIL static="true">mymail</EMAIL> <DESCRIPTION>distinguishedName</DESCRIPTION> </mapField> </LDAPConfig> </Params> <!-- <Params> <UserRolesProvider>es.cls.core.security.login.module.UserRolesProviderSP</UserRolesProvider> <UpdateUserRoles>true</UpdateUserRoles> <MayDeleteRoles>false</MayDeleteRoles> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> <UserCaseSensitive>true</UserCaseSensitive> <SPConfig> <SPSiteURL>http://sharepoint_server:1111/_layouts/EverSuite.SharePoint/UserInfo.aspx</SPSiteURL> <TimeOut>120000</TimeOut> <Domain>...</Domain> <adminSPUser>SharePoint Admin User</adminSPUser> <adminSPPassword> SharePoint Admin Password</adminSPPassword> </SPConfig> </Params> --> </LoginModule> </LoginModules> </Application>
<Application> <Name>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_KrbTGT</Name> <UserManagerHandler> <ClassName></ClassName> <Params/> </UserManagerHandler>
<CallbackHandler> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.callback.CallbackHandlerKrbTGT</ClassName> <Params> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> <MappedHostServer></MappedHostServer> <KerberosRealm></KerberosRealm> <KerberosKDC></KerberosKDC> </Params> </CallbackHandler>
<LoginModules> <LoginModule> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.module.LoginModuleSSO</ClassName> <FlagName>Required</FlagName> <Params> <UserRolesProvider>es.cls.core.security.login.module.UserRolesProviderLDAP</UserRolesProvider> <UpdateUserRoles>true</UpdateUserRoles> <MayDeleteRoles>false</MayDeleteRoles> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> <UserRoleMemberAttrName>memberOf</UserRoleMemberAttrName> <UserRoleRegExp>CN=(\w+)</UserRoleRegExp> <LDAPConfig> <url>ldap://.../</url> <baseDN>DC=...,DC=...</baseDN> <userLogToLDAP>true</userLogToLDAP> <defaultUser></defaultUser> <defaultRole></defaultRole> <usersRoot></usersRoot> <adminLDAPLogin>CN=...,OU=...,OU=...,DC=...,DC=...</adminLDAPLogin> <adminLDAPPassword>...</adminLDAPPassword> <loginAttrName>sAMAccountName</loginAttrName> <roleAttrName></roleAttrName> <mapField> <USERCODE>cn</USERCODE> <LASTNAME>sn</LASTNAME> <FIRSTNAME>givenName</FIRSTNAME> <EMAIL static="true">mymail</EMAIL> <DESCRIPTION>distinguishedName</DESCRIPTION> </mapField> </LDAPConfig> </Params> </LoginModule> </LoginModules> </Application>
<Application> <Name>EverSuite_Servlet_Login_Param</Name> <UserManagerHandler> <ClassName></ClassName> <Params/> </UserManagerHandler>
<CallbackHandler> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.callback.CallbackHandlerImpl</ClassName> <Params/> </CallbackHandler>
<LoginModules>
<LoginModule> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.module.LoginModuleCSUSER</ClassName> <FlagName>Required</FlagName> <Params> <UserRolesProvider>es.cls.core.security.login.module.UserRolesProviderCSUSER</UserRolesProvider> <UpdateUserRoles>true</UpdateUserRoles> <MayDeleteRoles>false</MayDeleteRoles> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> <UserCaseSensitive>true</UserCaseSensitive> </Params> </LoginModule> </LoginModules> </Application>
<Application> <Name>EverSuite_Servlet_Login</Name> <UserManagerHandler> <ClassName></ClassName> <Params/> </UserManagerHandler>
<CallbackHandler> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.callback.CallbackHandlerImpl</ClassName> <Params/> </CallbackHandler>
<LoginModules> <LoginModule> <ClassName>es.cls.core.security.login.module.LoginModuleCSUSER</ClassName> <FlagName>Required</FlagName> <Params> <UserRolesProvider>es.cls.core.security.login.module.UserRolesProviderCSUSER</UserRolesProvider> <UpdateUserRoles>true</UpdateUserRoles> <MayDeleteRoles>false</MayDeleteRoles> <DefaultRole>Public</DefaultRole> <UserCaseSensitive>true</UserCaseSensitive> </Params> </LoginModule> <!-- LDAP LoginModules try to find their own parameter list into the xml like below. If they don't find "LDAPConfig", they use the standard EverSuite LDAP parameter from CSPARAM.
config possible:
<UserRoleMemberAttrName>memberOf</UserRoleMemberAttrName>
or
<UserRoleMemberAttrName>member</UserRoleMemberAttrName> <UserRoleMemberStorageAttrValue>distinguishedName</UserRoleMemberStorageAttrValue> <LDAPRoleNode>OU=EVER-TEAM-Groupe-Distribution,DC=ever-team,DC=com</LDAPRoleNode>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <TYPES> <TYPE name="ROOT"> <CHILDRENS> <CHILDREN>LDAP</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>REPOSITORY</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>SQL</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>STATIC</CHILDREN> </CHILDRENS> </TYPE> <TYPE name="SQL" class="es.cls.core.filingplan.impl.SqlPlanType"> <CHILDRENS> <CHILDREN>DOCSQL</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>LDAP</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>REPOSITORY</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>SQL</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>STATIC</CHILDREN> </CHILDRENS> </TYPE> <TYPE name="DOCSQL" class="es.cls.core.filingplan.impl.DocSqlPlanType"> <CHILDRENS> <CHILDREN>LDAP</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>REPOSITORY</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>SQL</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>STATIC</CHILDREN> </CHILDRENS> </TYPE> <TYPE name="REPOSITORY" class="es.cls.core.filingplan.impl.RepositoryPlanType"> <CHILDRENS/> </TYPE> <TYPE name="LDAP" class="es.cls.core.filingplan.impl.LdapPlanType"> <CHILDRENS> <CHILDREN>LDAP</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>REPOSITORY</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>SQL</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>STATIC</CHILDREN> </CHILDRENS> </TYPE> <TYPE name="STATIC" class="es.cls.core.filingplan.impl.StaticPlanType"> <CHILDRENS> <CHILDREN>LDAP</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>REPOSITORY</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>SQL</CHILDREN> <CHILDREN>STATIC</CHILDREN> </CHILDRENS> </TYPE> </TYPES>

<?xml version="1.0"?> <Root> <Configs> <!-- How to encode passwords when they are saved to the table CSUSER --> <CSUSER> <Transforms>S2B.UTF-8;SHA.256;AES.0;B2S.Hex</Transforms> </CSUSER> <!-- How passwords were encoded in the past when the column PASSTRANS did not exist into the table CSUSER --> <CSUSER_Old> <Transforms>S2B.Default;RSA.WebApp;B2S.Base64</Transforms> </CSUSER_Old> <!-- Allow to just use its digest instead of the password --> <SHA1-Base64> <Transforms>S2B.UTF-8;SHA.1;B2S.Base64</Transforms> </SHA1-Base64>
<!-- Password transformations are applied one after each other, the input of the next is the output of the previous, either string or bytes. Some are just encoding, as S2B (String to Byte) or B2S (Byte to String) Some are encrypting, as RSA or AES (eat bytes and produce bytes) Some are digests (hashing), like SHA or MD (eat bytes and produce bytes) Digests are not reversibles because they miss the original content
Some examples of transformations : S2B.UTF-8;B2S.Base64 S2B.UTF-8;B2S.Hex S2B.UTF-8;SHA.1;B2S.Base64 S2B.UTF-8;SHA.256;B2S.Hex S2B.UTF-8;RSA.CryptUserPassword;B2S.Base64 S2B.UTF-8;SHA.256;AES.0;B2S.Hex S2B.UTF-8;AES.0;B2S.Hex (key length is 128) S2B.UTF-8;AES.1;B2S.Hex (key length is 256 which need special policy jar from Oracle to be permitted) --> </Configs> </Root>
